price: Na mwenzake atasema: Huyu niliye naye mimi kesha tayarishwa.
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
footnotes: Na Shetani wake aliye kuwa mwongozi wake duniani, atasema: Kafiri huyu alioko kwangu yuko tayari kuingia Jahannamu kwa kupotezwa nami.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
